reviews.title: Show full name of book at the header
reviews.comment: I\'m newbie, appreciate you can help show full name of each book at the header. Appreciate you can consider for enhancement, thanks!
reviews.author: LITTLELAMB TAN

reviews.title: footnotes are failed to switch
reviews.comment: footnote suddenly went back to work a few weeks ago,  unfortunately,  it fails to work again after update...even in nexus 4
reviews.author: Afonso Juno Chan

reviews.comment: Thanks for the quick fix to support Android 4.3.
reviews.author: Larry Wang

reviews.title: Cannot read the Bible!
reviews.comment: It worked fine for a few months but maybe the new update has corrupted it? It crashes when I read the Bible now!
reviews.author: Juanita Yau

reviews.comment: Highlight function \344\277\202\345\224\224\351\214\257idea, But once you close the bible, the highlight are all gone. \345\247\220\344\277\202highlight\351\273\216\345\206\207\347\224\250\343\200\202\343\200\202 please fix it
reviews.author: amber L

reviews.title: Great Chinese Bible App
reviews.comment: I like the map function. It is really helpful.
reviews.author: Emil Moon

reviews.comment: But after I have updated it, I can\'t access to the library. Please fix it
reviews.author: GIG AY

reviews.title: Good offline Bible
reviews.comment: From a major organisation this app is quite disappointing. At least have option to change the font size. Nevertheless it is fast and lets you read offline.
reviews.author: Ki Chi Leung

reviews.title: No record
reviews.comment: No purchase record after upgrade to newest version, still not after reinstall and even worse i cant get my purchased bible back as nth in the store, pls fix it!  Update: its fixed now, thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hung
reviews.comment: Is it possible to allow the APP to move to SD Card? so that we can save memory......Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very neat! If app can share multiple verses then it will becomes perfect..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung S3
reviews.comment: Nothing shown in the bookstore for me to download
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Highly recommended.
reviews.comment: This may not be the most feature-rich Chinese Bible study tool yet, but their excellent user-support and quick responses plus ongoing product improvements mean I can feel comfortable with all my purchases of Biblical ebooks over this app and rely on such promising app to study God\'s words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: And must for all Bible reader!
reviews.comment: If the purchased dictionary can instantly active while long press to the word will be excellence!  Other than that, superb!
reviews.author: A Google User
